entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, introduced as a powerful figure who is addressing others.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: A character who is being addressed by Voldemort, described as having yellowish and waxy skin, sunken eyes, and a hoarse voice.

relationships.description: Voldemort is addressing Lucius Malfoy, indicating a power dynamic between the two characters.
